services.title: Custom Web Development
services.shortDescription: Build powerful, scalable websites with modern technologies
services.fullDescription: Our expert developers create custom websites tailored to your business needs using the latest technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js.

services.title: Responsive Web Design
services.shortDescription: Mobile-first designs that work perfectly on all devices
services.fullDescription: Create stunning, mobile-responsive websites that provide excellent user experience across all devices and screen sizes.

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.shortDescription: Complete online stores with payment integration
services.fullDescription: Build comprehensive e-commerce platforms with secure payment gateways, inventory management, and customer relationship tools.

services.title: SEO & Digital Marketing
services.shortDescription: Boost your online visibility and attract more customers
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive SEO services to improve your search rankings and drive organic traffic to your website.

services.title: Website Maintenance
services.shortDescription: Keep your website secure, updated, and performing optimally
services.fullDescription: Ongoing website maintenance services to ensure your site stays secure, updated, and performing at its best.

services.title: WordPress Development

services.fullDescription: Specialized WordPress development services including custom themes, plugins, and complete WordPress solutions.
